text:
2351 Richmond Terrace, north side, at Irving Avenue. Robinson's map of 1898 shows it to have been the Kill Van Kull Yacht Club. Mr. Sperr states that it was at one time Johnson's ship chandlery. In the background appears the Dean Linseed Oil Works.

September 28, 1924

By Wm. T. Davis through P. L. Sperr
title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - Irving Avenue
